Name: AH20H002
Element name: multidrug efflux RND transporter permease subunit OqxB25
Closest reference name: multidrug efflux RND transporter permease subunit OqxB25
rule curation note: Wildtype core gene encoding an efflux pump. This efflux pump likely contributes to the ciprofloxacin MIC distribution in K. pneumoniae being shifted upwards compared to other Enterobacteriaceae, but it is not associated with clinical resistance in this species unless efflux activity is upregulated. (The specific alleles or mutations associated with upregulation of the efflux pump in K. pneumoniae are not well described.)

Name: AH20H002

Closest reference name: multidrug efflux RND transporter periplasmic adaptor subunit OqxA
evidence limitations: low clinical relevance, lacks evidence for this allele

Name: AH20H002
Element name: FosA5 family fosfomycin resistance glutathione transferase
Closest reference name: FosA5 family fosfomycin resistance glutathione transferase
rule curation note: Wildtype core gene, not expected to confer multiple drug resistance unless mobilised under strong promoter (fosA5_family is the parent node for K. pneumoniae chromosomal fosA)

Name: AH20H002
rule curation note: Wildtype core gene, all SHV alleles are expected to confer resistance to penicillins (penams), explaining the expected resistant to ampicillin. (Certain SHV alleles can also have expanded enzyme activity, and confer resistance to third-generation cephalosporins.)
